text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: "Ojo [mexohed] sumoro az cize ogoh kunam, ki az in [doroiho va lazzathoi moddi] ʙehtar ʙosad"? Kasone, ki taqvo pesa kardaand, nazdi Parvardigorason ʙoƣhoe dorand, ki az zeri [daraxtoni] on cujʙorho ravon ast; covidona dar on xohand ʙud va hamsaroni pokiza [va ʙeajʙ dorand] va [hamcunin] az xusnudii Alloh taolo [ʙarxurdorand]; va Alloh taolo ʙa [ahvoli] ʙandagon ʙinost
